name: Cell Connect 2048
description:
Enjoy this cell Connect 2048 which is easy addictive puzzle game as it is a fun but challenging game. This Cell Connect 2048 block octa puzzle game is easy to play but hard to master.

How to Play?

1) Move the cell with same number of same color together.
2) Connect at least 4 cells with the same number to get a bigger number. Score increases as the number becomes bigger.
3) When cell is moved but it could not connect 4 same number cells then random number would appear, increasing the challenge.
4) Target is to make as many 2048 as possible in this addictive cell connect 2048 puzzle game. Let's see who makes more numbers of 2048 in this cell connect 2048 puzzle game.
